data_table.description: Exclusions for Brain MRI and Neuropsychology Measures Close to Exam 8 (Offspring), measured from May 2004 through July 2011. These exclusions (prevalent stroke, dementia, other neurological condition) are to be used with dataset vr_mrbnpe8_2011_1_0480s.

variable.name: np_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at the time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mri_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at time of MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at time of MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at time of MRI

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: np_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.
